Document.Title: Adobe Flex 2 and Fireworks CS3: Fireworks Only Supports mx:Image Elements

Content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:Application
    x­mlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml"
    width="128" height="128"
    layout="absolute">

<!--
    The Adobe Fireworks CS3 File > Export command
    has an export type called “MXML and Images”
    that ALWAYS produces mx:Image elements.

    There is NO SUPPORT for vector-like elements
    such as mx:Shape.
-->

	<mx:Image
        source="Image.gif"
        x="5" y="14"
        width="121" height="111"/>

</mx:Application>
